short_desc: Specialized job search for Ukrainians. We remove the complexity so you can focus on what matters.
mini_version_desc:
We search for jobs from Adzuna, Careerjet, Jobicy, Remotive.
Advanced search, more professions, and email subscriptions are available in the full version of the site (link below).
jobs_hint: ‚ö†Ô∏è The list is shortened in the mini-version. More professions are on the full site.
